views.markdown:
Added iOS 10 support bug fixes fixed a bug preventing from sending an email

fixed bugs

re-written code from scratch
supports ios 9.3.3
fixed issues with instagram

Updated to support iOS 9 Added TweetBot alert Style (Special Thanks to MAXHASDHD for MLAlertView)
Added support for WhatsApp call
Updated support for some apps
Re-written preference code from scratch
added support for springboard and notes
fixed instagram issues
fixed all bugs (touch id) and problems on older devices

Added TouchID confirmation instead of UIAlert if you want for SMS And Phone app (most important to me in my opinion) enter password is still not working and you have to choose either UIAlert or FingerPrint not the two at the same time :P

updated for ios 8 Apple made it impossible to call preferences in third party apps so sometimes you have to close the app 2 to 3 times for changes to apply. Added support for facebook messenger and Tweetbot3

Added support for FaceTime (favorites and recent tabs)
added support for skype (dialer and call from conversation is coming soon)

added the ability to customize the alert text to your liking :)

added SoundAlert than allows you to play a sound when receiving an alert
added confirmation for the recents tab im phone app
